entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Grand Forks
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle this morning. Periods of rain beginning this afternoon. Snow level 1000 metres. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 09 January 2023
